definition: compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
courtesy umbrella (one made available for borrowing)

sentences.english: The Chinese people faced this disaster with compassion and courage.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民用愛心和勇氣來面對這場災難。

sentences.english: As Mars moves opposite your sign, you could feel listless and depressed about love.
sentences.chinese: 火星與你對立，你可能對愛心生怠倦和沮喪。

sentences.english: I heard that a mass campaign encouraging show love to the victims of earthquake-stricken area is now widespread.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說爲地震災區的災民獻愛心的活動在廣泛開展。

sentences.english: Draw a heart on her makeup mirror.
sentences.chinese: 在她的化妝鏡上畫顆愛心。

sentences.english: I wish you a gay and merry Christmas. All emotion and finest wishes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 以我所有的愛心與竭誠祝你及全家聖誕快樂。

sentences.english: Understand the loving care the characters show to disabled people.
sentences.chinese: 認真領會劇中主人公爲殘疾兒童獻愛心的精神。

sentences.english: An encourager is a caring and compassionate person.
sentences.chinese: 要鼓勵他人首先自己要具有愛心和熱情。

sentences.english: It looked perfect, like a hand-carved mineral Valentine.
sentences.chinese: 它的形狀十分完美，像一顆手工雕刻的礦石愛心。

sentences.english: You will have all if possessing of a self-giving kind heart.
sentences.chinese: 擁有一顆無私的愛心，便擁有了一切。

sentences.english: Pre k - 6Th grade tutor, after school service.
sentences.chinese: 小學生家助教，愛心，優良環境。

sentences.english: With sings a song, everybody blossoms happily, the compassion delivers warm, the joyful thousands of family.
sentences.chinese: 同唱一支歌，人人樂開花，愛心送溫暖，快樂千萬家。

sentences.english: Sometimes we hear people say that so and so is really a very loving person.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我們聽人說某某人是一個非常有愛心的人。

sentences.english: The darker the shadows of sorrow become the more brightly the lamp of love shines.
sentences.chinese: 表達愛心的最好方平魄幫助比我們更加不幸的人。

sentences.english: Love is a lamp which is brighter in darker places.
sentences.chinese: 愛心是一盞燈，在越黑的地方越明亮。

sentences.english: He showered his love lavishly on everyone he knew.
sentences.chinese: 他向每一個認識的人慷慨的奉獻愛心。

sentences.english: Send a phone card or care package to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 給士兵們寄電話卡或是愛心包裹。
